text: And Hope to Die (, ) is a 1972 French Italian Canadian crime thriller movie directed by René Clément and was based on the novel Black Friday by David Goodis. It stars Jean-Louis Trintignant, Robert Ryan, Aldo Ray, Lea Massari, Jean Gaven, Robert Party, Jean Coutu, Tisa Farrow, Daniel Breton and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:French crime movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Canadian crime movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by René Clément
title: And Hope to Die
